Description: Fragment of papyrus written with black ink with demotic legal text. Writing on verso only, list of witnesses. Now joined with P BM EA 10404. P BM EA 10442 is the upper fragment, with 7 names of the original list of 16 witnesses.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (48645) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/48645)
